meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Shore Dave Leach Kristin Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6548.

td.p: Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas
Dave Leach, a game merchant from Atlanta, Georgia
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama

tr.td: ETIQUETTE
ON THE MAP
WE'VE HIT BOTTOM
EVERYTHING FROM A TO C
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "A" and end with a "C".)
BRITCOMS
LITERATURE: THE END OF THE LINE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Kristin\'s wager] In the movie Patton, George C. Scott says, "l\'audace, toujours l\'audace". And that\'s what you demonstrated with that wager.)
JasonWhat is Take Five?
$10,022
DaveWhat is Take Five?
$3,401
KristinWhat is Take Five?
$17,601
\"Take Five\"')
